answers.answer: Does any 1 seen such case? Can anybody help me in this universe ?
What meds is she taking? I know januvia can cause joint pains. Did she have these pains bedore she started taking her meds? It can also be totally unrelated.

question: My Mom is having type-2 diabetes , her pre-lunch blood suger level is 178 & post-lunch 275. She is having join pain in legs due to which she feels trouble in walking & cannot stand for longer time. Her age is 63. Doctor has increase the medicine intake but that doesn't help to reduce join pain she is having in legs. Any suggestion would be appreciable. Thanks in advance.
title: Type-2 diabetes & having pain in joins in legs
